code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var cartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:[],reducers:{addCart:function addCart(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},removeCartItem:function removeCartItem(state,action){return state.filter(function(item){return item.name!==action.payload.name;});},addQuantity:function addQuantity(state,action){return state.map(function(element){if(element.name===action.payload.name)return action.payload;return element;});}}});export var cartSelector=function cartSelector(state){return state.cart;};export default cartSlice;var _cartSlice$actions=cartSlice.actions,addCart=_cartSlice$actions.addCart,removeCartItem=_cartSlice$actions.removeCartItem,addQuantity=_cartSlice$actions.addQuantity;export{addCart,removeCartItem,addQuantity};
